channel.title: Vae on Akhil’s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vae on Akhil’s Blog

item.title: Fun with LoRA: How Low-Rank Can We Go Before Adjacency Matrices Break Down?
item.description: How far can you compress adjacency matrices before everything falls apart? I pushed LoRA to its limits and watched adjacency melt into noise.

item.title: Why VAEs changed the way I think about modeling
item.description: VAEs were my introduction to machine learning and I was stuck understanding how we go from linear regression to this. However, I did end up learning a lot on this non-traditional path.
